mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_COMPANY WHERE CC_RECRUIT_NO = #{recruitNo} ORDER BY CC_NO DESC

when.foreach: INTO COMMENTS_GOOD_MAP VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{writer}, (SELECT GOOD_NO FROM COMMENTS_GOOD WHERE GOOD_NAME = #{item}))
INTO COMMENTS_BAD_MAP VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{writer}, (SELECT BAD_NO FROM COMMENTS_BAD WHERE BAD_NAME = #{item}))
INTO COMMENTS_CONDITION_MAP VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{writer}, (SELECT CONDITION_NO FROM COMMENTS_CONDITION WHERE CONDITION_NAME = #{item}))
INTO COMMENTS_AIR_MAP VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{writer}, (SELECT AIR_NO FROM COMMENTS_AIR WHERE AIR_NAME = #{item}))
INTO COMMENTS_PAY_MAP VALUES (#{recruitNo}, #{writer}, (SELECT PAY_NO FROM COMMENTS_PAY WHERE PAY_NAME = #{item}))

mapper.select: SELECT AIR_NAME FROM COMMENTS_AIR ORDER BY AIR_NO
SELECT CONDITION_NAME FROM COMMENTS_CONDITION ORDER BY CONDITION_NO
SELECT PAY_NAME FROM COMMENTS_PAY ORDER BY PAY_NO
SELECT GOOD_NAME FROM COMMENTS_GOOD ORDER BY GOOD_NO
